Rules.InvariantScript:
Sort(
    Filter(
        'Lead Activities.S',
        Party.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)
If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Sort(
    Filter(
        offlineLeadCollection,
        Party.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)

Sort(
    Filter(
        OfflineVisitCollection,
        Party.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)

"Total Tax: " & "" & If(
    IsBlank(
        Sum(
            ThisItem.CGST,
            ThisItem.SGST,
            ThisItem.IGST
        )
    ),
    0,
    Sum(
        ThisItem.CGST,
        ThisItem.SGST,
        ThisItem.IGST
    )
)

Sort(
    Filter(
        OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
        'Order From'.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode //&& IsToday('Created On')
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)
